version_description:
- Color Scanning. Scan documents with original pictures, color stamps and signatures.

- Slide Over and Split View Support. Now you can open Scanner Mini and any third-party applications — at the same time.

- iOS 9 Compatibility. Scanner Mini is fully compatible with iOS 9 now.

- Search within Scanner Mini. Easily search for documents that you have scanned with Scanner Mini using Spotlight.

- Protect your PDF documents. Add the password, the recipients should enter before opening your document.

Please, spend a minute and leave a quick review in the App Store. It really helps others make a better decision before downloading Scanner Mini.

Scanner Mini remains the best free scanning app and brings you all the latest updates. We’ve added extensive support for iOS 9 and 3D Touch features.

Entirely new way of interaction with Scanner Mini:

+ Quick Actions. Just press on the Scanner Mini icon and make a quick scan from your Camera or Photos (iPhone 6s only).

+ Enjoy Peek and Pop actions. Peek at your scans and folders for a quick content preview. Pop to open the necessary one (iPhone 6s only).

+ Use Spotlight to easily search for documents that you have scanned with Scanner Mini.

+ Use Multi tasking to run Scanner Mini with other apps at the same time

Please, spend a minute and leave a quick review in the App Store. It really helps others make a better decision before downloading Scanner Mini.

Stability improvements and bug fixes.

It would be great if you leave us a review on iTunes. It really encourages others to learn more about Scanner Mini.

We are super excited to announce a major update to the most popular scanning app for iPhone and iPad.

Scanner Mini is MUCH better and all existing customers are getting it for free.

Enjoy using the new and improved features of Scanner Mini.

* Text Recognition (OCR)
You asked, so we did it. Convert any scan into a text that can be selected and copied.

Scanner Mini supports 12 languages recognition: English, German, Italian, French, Spanish, Russian, Portuguese, Dutch, Turkish, Polish, Swedish and Norwegian.

* Distortion Correction
Scan open books, magazines or any other paper documents and get distortion-free images.

* Workflows
Send an email with a defined recipient, upload to Dropbox and save document to the required folder. Using workflows, you can perform all these actions in just one tap.

* Improved Color Processing
We enhanced the quality of color processing so documents with original pictures, color stamps and signatures look even better.

* New Easier Design
We refined major screens to make Scanner Mini both faster and easier to use.

It would be great if you leave a review on iTunes. It really encourages others to learn more about Scanner Mini.

+ Added 9 OCR languages: Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Danish, Greek, Croatian, Estonian, Ukrainian.
+ Improved distortion correction technology.
+ Stability improvements and bug fixes.

Thanks for using Scanner Mini by Readdle!

+ Copy all text from recognised document with one tap.
+ General performance and stability improvements.

Thank you for using Scanner Mini! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.

+ iOS 10 Compatibility. Scanner Mini is fully compatible with iOS 10.
+ General performance and stability improvements.

Cyber Monday Sale for the PRO version! Get 50% off or half price, whichever is less.

Happy holidays, everyone!
Before the final rush of the season we wanted to provide you with one more update that is focused on internal stability and improvements.
Thank you to everyone who reached out with feedback both positive and constructive.
We appreciate it!

Happy holidays, everyone!
We apologize for the back-to-back update, but it turns out there were a couple more bugs that needed squashing.
Under the hood stability improvements and crash exorcism. :)

Thank you to everyone who reached out with feedback both positive and constructive. We appreciate it!

Today's update brings you a handful of important fixes.
The most prominent one is the fix for Dropbox sign-in issue!
Also under the hood stability improvements and crash exorcism.

If you want to thank our tireless team, please write a review or recommend Scanner Mini to your friends.
We're always here for you at rdsupport@readdle.com

We care a lot about the security of your data and in support of upcoming changes to the EU data protection laws (GDPR), we’ve updated our Privacy Policy: so, you can continue using our products with confidence.

We're always here for you at rdsupport@readdle.com

Though iOS 12 is about a few months away from its official release, today's update brings with it a fix for a crash of Scanner Pro on iOS 12.
Thanks to everyone who reached out!

Hello folks!
The word of the day for today’s update is Stability.
From unexpected behaviors to crashes, we’ve slain a large number of bugs that should result in a more stable, more predictable Scanner Mini for everyone.
Thank you for the feedback and the feature requests, we always love hearing what we can do to make Scanner Mini better.

If you need us you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com
Just pop on over to our Support Team and we'll point you in the right direction.

Hello folks!
This week we've been working on a number of "quality of life" improvements to Scanner Mini.
Thanks for your continuing feedback. We love hearing from you!
If you need us, you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com

Much of the work in today’s update was focused on a deep dive into the internal stability and improvements.
Thank you to all who took the time to write in to rdsupport@readdle.com

Exciting features are coming soon!
If you want to thank our tireless team, please write a review or recommend Scanner Mini to your friends!

Happy iOS 12 Day!
With today’s update Scanner Mini is ready to go on the latest and greatest that Apple has to offer.
What we did do was bring incredible Siri Shortcuts from iOS 12 on iPhone & iPad and made them right at home in Scanner Mini.
Since now you can make a scan much faster by launching the app with just a shortcut.

We hope you enjoy this release.
As always, you can reach us at rdsupport@readdle.com
Keep the feedback coming!

Meet some internal enhancements and stability improvements to your favorite Scanner Mini.
From here on out, it's smooth sailing on iOS 12!

As always, you can reach us at rdsupport@readdle.com

We're back again to you with a few small but important bug fixes and improvements.

Keep the feedback coming!

Much of the work in today’s update was focused on a deep dive into the internal stability and improvements.
Thank you to all who took the time to write in to rdsupport@readdle.com

Exciting features are coming soon!

Your Readdle Team is back to you!
As the holidays approach there is magic in the air, and we've managed to harness some of that magic for our latest release.

- We've put some magic on the border detection tuning, especially for iPhone users of Scanner Mini so that you can crop your scans manually much faster and more precisely. Enjoy!
- Since now you can find a Share-Your-Scans dialogue that is aimed to help our team improve the scanning quality of the app. In case your scan is far from being perfect, you can always share it with our team. It will make a huge difference to us. Thank you in advance!

We love hearing from you!
If you feel in the holiday spirit and have a couple of minutes, please leave a review in the App Store or get in touch with us at rdsupport@readdle.com

Today's first-in-this-year update brings a few small but important bug fixes. Let's dive in:

[FIXED]
• Scan cropping no longer causes the magnifier to twitch from side to side. Enjoy!
• Now the page size of your scan does comply with ANSI standard.
• Fixed a rare crash that might occur when creating a folder with the name "Inbox" and uploading it to iCloud Drive. Now you won't be able to create folders with such a name:)
• Fixed an issue where a merged file with an identical name as an existing one results in deleting of both files.

We had some fantastic help from many of you tracking these bugs down. Thank you!
Keep the feedback coming at rdsupport@readdle.com

Much of the work in today’s update was focused on a deep dive into the internal stability and improvements.
Thank you to all who took the time to write to rdsupport@readdle.com

Exciting features are coming soon! Stay tuned!

Hello folks!
Today’s update brings you a few new features and a number of “quality of life” improvements!

## Meet a new way to share scans
Now you can send your scans to any messenger much faster with a new share menu. Give it a try!

## Reduce the size of your scans
No need to look for an alternative while sharing big scans. Select the preferred file size of scans before you email them or save to a cloud service.

We hope you enjoy the update as much as we do!
Keep the feedback coming at rdsupport@readdle.com

Greetings and salutations!
It's Labor Day weekend here in Ukraine and we've been laboring away to clean up a few issues you've brought to our attention.

Thank you to all who reached out at rdsupport@readdle.com
We love hearing from you!

We didn’t want to throw away our shot at bringing you one more update with broad improvements and preparatory work for future updates.

Many thanks for your feedback sending every now and then at rdsupport@readdle.com
If you want to thank our tireless team, please write a review on the App Store or recommend Scanner Mini to your friends!

Another “spit and polish” release, addressing many of the most common issues you’ve told us about.
Please keep the feedback coming at rdsupport@readdle.com

And stay tuned! New features are coming soon!

Hello folks!
Today's update contains a handful of important fixes including the issue where some customers were having troubles signing in to their OneNote account in Scanner app.
Thank you to everyone who wrote in and helped us track down the steps we needed to reproduce and squash this particular bug.
If you need us you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com and we'll point you in the right direction.
Stay tuned! New exciting features are coming soon!

Today’s update is all about magic – Magical Shadow Removal is at your service!
Now you’ll get top-notch shadow free scans even in low-light conditions. Update the app and give it a try!
We’ve also addressed some fax issues you were experiencing and found some additional performance improvements we could make in the process.

If you need us, you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com
Stay tuned! New exciting features are coming soon!

Hello, everyone!
It's WWDC week coming to us with all-online experience like never before, and our team didn’t want to throw away our shot at bringing you a few minor improvements here and there.

Many thanks for your feedback. Please stay in touch with us at rdsupport@readdle.com
If you want to thank our tireless team, please write a review on the App Store or recommend Scanner app to your friends!

Today’s update is mainly about new features – Displaying documents from iCloud, “Select All” function and Flashlight instead of a flash on camera!
Let’s dive in, shall we?

## Displaying documents from iCloud
Some of you have been complaining on chaotic and slow document loading on the homepage: you either didn’t see any scans for a long time or scans loaded haphazardly pushing already loaded ones down. We’re still developing the feature, but at this point documents load much faster, all at the same time and in the correct order according to the sorting. For you it will result in a smoother loading experience. Yay!

## Improved Drag & Drop
You also have reported difficulty with DnD on 3D Touch devices since iOS 13. We tested and discovered that 3D Touch is somehow conflicting with the DnD on the aforementioned devices, we fixed that. For you it will result in a smoother Drag and Drop experience.

## “Select All’ function
Another long-term ask from our users, who want to easily select all documents to share or delete them. We’ve added this simple button so that you can go into Select mode on your homepage.

And here are some features outside of homepage:

* Improved Pages Management
Pages Management hides behind the ‘4 squares’ icon in Scanner and affords you to copy, move or delete pages in a document. We’ve added navigation mode to help users go to the needed page of a multi-page document.

* Flashlight instead of Flash on camera
When it comes to scanning on your phone in low light, the options are kind of terrible: a super bright flash whitens documents and without it documents end up blurry or grainy. Using the flashlight it will yield more control (since you can play around with the angle at which the light falls on the document) and better results (better border detection, less additional shadows from the burst of flash light).

We hope, you love this update as much as we do.
If you need us you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com
Just pop on over to our Support Team and they'll point you in the right direction.
